items.title: Why ‘Emilia Pérez,’ a Film About Mexico, Flopped in Mexico
items.description: The polarizing movie is up for 13 Academy Awards on Sunday. But in Mexico, it has been widely criticized for its depiction of the country.

items.title: Iowa Moves to Eliminate Trans Rights, and Zelensky Heads to the White House

items.title: What We Know About Gene Hackman’s Death
items.description: Mr. Hackman was found dead inside his home, along with his wife and a dog. The sheriff’s office in Santa Fe, N.M., is investigating.
